meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sam Suarez Tracy McCarthy Scott Lord Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7120.

td.p: Sam Suarez, a postdoctoral researcher from Cary, North Carolina
Tracy McCarthy, a customer service manager from Vista, California
Scott Lord, a construction attorney from Santa Monica, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $93,402)

tr.td: APOSTOLIC NAMES
STATE CAPITALS
TRANSPORTATION
NOT CHESS AGAIN!
TV ROLES
DOUBLE D WITH ANOTHER D
(Alex: That'll be three "D"s, at least, in each correct response.)

a ship

ScottTracy
Triple Stumper
')

$14,000
Iceland')
